title: Sling
content:
The most exciting web3 opportunities center around applications that will onboard many millions, and eventually billions, of users to crypto by offering a combination of true utility and an easy to use, best in class consumer product. These products have to solve real problems and do so in a way that brings a sense of magic to the average user. Something that used to be harder, more expensive, or less enjoyable simply becomes easier and better. Crypto needs to be the “how” but not the “why.” 

The post Sling appeared first on Union Square Ventures.
author: Rebecca Kaden
